name: Build the Nublar: Evolved
description:
It's been 2 years since the last time anyone attempted to build the Nublar. You failed before, but now you're ready... right?

Build the Nublar: Evolved is an upcoming reimagining of the original Build the Nublar that brings new mechanics, depth, graphics, replayability, and most importantly more dino carnage than ever before.

The game is currently in development but in the mean time you can play Build the Nublar: Evolved: Prologue, the world's first entirely text-based dinosaur theme park building game, for free! All of the fun of managing your park, with none of the pesky graphics! This prologue was created for Wizard Jam 7.
